title: BUG: Sass `@forward with` rules breaks parser

labels.name: lang:css/scss/less
labels.description: Issues affecting CSS, Less or SCSS

body:
**Prettier 2.4.1**
[Playground link](https://prettier.io/playground/#N4Igxg9gdgLgprEAuEAdKABAZhATgdwENcATAAgHIcIA6AZzDrorPwEsYALMgCnTLIASSAFsADtAQw6SMrjgkANOgCUAbnQhFICGJhtodZKGK4I+AArEERlIQA2RAJ5HtAI1yEwAazgwAyoQicAAybFBwyFgOdHDunj5+-mJe4QDmyDC4AK5xIHAibgokCiGEUGnZhGlwAGJ4IoQw+hXIIITZMBBaIJwwIvYA6pwccHQpYHD+NhxsAG4cTm2MriDhsbgwFp5pjVExeQBWdAAe-un2cACK2RDw+-ax2im4G20MTD1iuOEwg2wkLjIAAcAAZnmZYoNPGI2t8xnBcHNItoAI63eDbXS2dp0AC0EQUCh68nRbHk22qeyQ0UeeViIjYmRy9Iu1wxkRpB20MEIbn+gM4yAATDzPGx7OkAMIQETU-J0ACsPWysQAKnzbLSniA5rkAJJQEqwfxgH56ACCRv8MCclwesQAvo6gA)
<!-- prettier-ignore -->
```sh
--parser scss
```

**Input:**
<!-- prettier-ignore -->
```scss
/* https://sass-lang.com/documentation/at-rules/forward#configuring-modules */
@forward 'foo.scss' with (
  $components: red,
);

```

**Output:**
<!-- prettier-ignore -->
```scss
TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'type')
    at Object.print (https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:310074)
    at https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:109862
    at c (https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:109956)
    at a (https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:109245)
    at https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:312320
    at https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:107705
    at Zf.each (https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:107614)
    at Zf.map (https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:107684)
    at Object.print (https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:312288)
    at https://prettier.io/lib/standalone.js:36:109862
```

**Expected behavior:**
